product.name: Summer Infant Wood Banister & Stair Safety Pet and Baby Gate, 32"-48" Wide, 33" Tall, Install Banister to Banister or Wall, or Wall to Wall in Doorway or Stairway, Banister and Hardware Mounts - Oak
product.description: Keep your loved ones safe & secure in style with the The Summer Banister and Stair Dog and Baby Gate with Dual Installation Kit. Measuring 33" tall, this honey oak wood safety gate conveniently helps contain children and pets while complementing your home decor. This gate fits spaces from 32 to 48 inches wide, with a door that opens the entire width of the gate making it easy to walk through. A no-threshold design minimizes the chance of tripping. Install it in doorways, hallways or at the top or bottom of stairs with included hardware (no drilling required for square banisters). Recommended tools for hardware installation (not included): drill, Phillips-head screwdriver, pencil, measuring tape.
product.bullet_points:
• The Summer Banister and Stair Dog and Baby Gate fits openings 32” to 48” wide and is 33" tall; please measure opening prior to purchase to ensure proper fit
• With the dual installation kit, the wood gate can be attached to a wall or to most single and double square and round banisters; no drilling required on square banisters
• This baby gate accommodates banister-to-banister and banister to wall installation at the top or bottom of stairs, as well as installation in doorways and hallways
• Adults can easily open the toddler gate one-handed; the door opens the entire width of the gate so it's easy to walk through and the no-threshold design minimizes tripping
• Be sure it's secure with the locking indicator and a support foot that provides extra stability; the protrusion on the latch prevents door from swinging outward over stairs; 3rd party safety tested and approved
